(kolambaa, lankapuwath) – kolambaa nagaraye pawathina dadi wahana thadabadaya sandaha piliyam sandaha wana idiri kriyamarga salasum kirime aarambhaka piyawarak lesa baththaramulla pradeshaye sthapitha rajaye karyalayanhi karyalaya welawe yam wenasak kirimata rajaya thiranaya kara athi athara mema niyamu wyapruthiya ada (18) sita kriyathmaka kere.

kula pidanaya athulu wada wasam prawanathawalin thawamath kanthawa pida windina indiyawata saha pakisthanayata wada idiriyen sitiyath nidahasin anathuruwa shri lankawe kantha ayithiwasikam binda watemin pawathina bawayi aasiyanu manawa himikam komisame basil pranandu me athara sandeshayata kiya sitiye.wisheshayenma adhyapana kshethraye kanatha ayithiwasikam pirihemin pawathina athara, shri lankawata widesha winimaya upayana laksha pahalowakata aasanna gruhastha kamkaruwange ayithiwasikam niyojanaya kirimata kisidu sanwidhanayak nathi bawa ohu penwa deyi.ayislanthayen anathuruwa darshakaye idiriyenma sitinne skandinewiyanu ratawal.
abhimanawath ithihasaya, sanskruthika watinakam saha apekama pilibandawa lowata handaga kiyannata kawiya pa්rabala shakthiyak wu bawa ohu pawasiya.

eeth ee thahanam kirimata nowana bawath, ee sambandhayen danata sakachchawak pawathina bawath ohu mehidi penwa dunneya.

hadunumpatha nathi wu bawata padinchi palathe polis sthanaye paminillak kota ee paminille sahathika pitapathak ragena ena lesayi.paminillak dana eka nam ee tharam amaru nathi unath ehi pitapathak laba ganima yanu lesi katayuththak nowana bawa polisiye kalayak sewaya kala ayeku hatiyata ma hondinma dana sitiya.kohomatath paminilla karala aayemath passe dawasaka yanna wena bawa mama dannawa.monawa unath kamak naha kiyala hithala mama kolambaa indala ena gamanma mage niwasata andala polis sthanaya wechcha waliweriya polisiyata aawe edama paminilla dala..paminili pitapathak illala lipiyak bhara dila yanna hithagena..mama waliweriya polisiyata aawe awurudu dolahakata withara passe thamayi.anthimata aawe polis warthawak ganna 1998 awurudde wage kiyalayi mata mathaka..habayi eeta kalin nam mayi malliyi masa deka thunakata sarayak withara hath ata wathawak polisiyata bada gala thiyenawa...ee ithin oya atha paye hiri ara ganima sandaha api denna korapu kiyapu punchi punchi sangaraha sathkara wenuwen ee sathkara labu udawiya wisin karanu labu danum dim walata anuwa polosiye mahathanwarun wisin mahansi nobala ape gedaratama awith dila yana thundu kaliwalata nosalaka harinna honda nathi hindayi.ee giyata passe ithin waruwak withara polisiye bankuwe sapata wadi wela indala..oya sajan unnahe kenek karana dayabara aamanthranaya ahagena pus patawu wage indala aapahu enawa.eeta eha karunu karana dura diga yanne naththe ithin ara danumdimu karapu udawiya wisinma karanawa allala danta kamathi wena hindama thamayi.ehema naththan ithin aaye gamata aawa gaman thawath usas ganaye sangaraha sathkara lakhena bawata undala danna nisayi ehema samadanayakin wade kammuthu wenne...polisiye banku lalle degollama ekata wadi wela inna gamanma ape malaya wisin hastha mudrawen karanu labana tharjana garujana hinda kohomin kohoma hari wade chakablas...habayi ithin oya chandikan danna kalin apith kollo kurutto sandhiye..
